item.title: pmgo
item.description: What is PMGO - Permissionset Manager in Go for Salesforce.com This is a simple cli based tool that generates permissionset xml from a spreadsheet. The advantage of this approach is that the permissions are mastered and tracked on a spreadsheet, generating permissionsets are not a costly exercise. Since generation of multiple permissionsets at one go is simple, this allows the consultant to implement strategies that allow for overlapping common permissions and permissionset groups.
